SELECT COALESCE(SUM(buyQuantity*price),0) FROM order_products inner join orders o on order_products.orderId = o.id WHERE vendorId = #{vendorId} AND deliveryDate > DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND order_status = 'SUCCESS'
